header.name: Mobile Device Management
header.description: Our Mobile Device Management offering is a full-service solution, delivered in a Cloud-based utility model that puts you in control and allows you to track, monitor, manage and secure corporate and employee-owned mobile devices cost effectively. We’ll provide you an MDM solution so that you can configure devices over-the-air for enterprise access, give you a way to monitor compliance with your specific security policies and a secure method to deliver approved corporate mobile apps. If a device is lost, you can remotely lock or wipe specific confidential data from that phone or tablet over-the-air. Our MDM solution is the easiest, most effective way to gain visibility and control of both corporate and employee-owned mobile devices, without investing in hardware or paying software licenses. Because it’s delivered in a Cloudbased utility model, you only pay for activated devices. In short, it’s the right solution for today’s mobile business world.
